definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Objective Discuss the anti-fatigue action of pseudo-ginsenoside GQ.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨伪人参皂苷GQ抗运动性疲劳的功效。

sentences.english: Radish and ginseng make people full of vitality.
sentences.chinese: 萝卜小人参，常吃有精神。

sentences.english: The King sent over a package of powder for dressing the wounds together with a cup of ginseng soup for easing pain.
sentences.chinese: 国王命人赐了一包棒疮药，又送了一盏定痛人参汤。

sentences.english: The results indicated that the contents of protein in Chinese ginseng seeds were more than American ginseng seeds.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，人参种子肉蛋白质含量高于西洋参种子。

sentences.english: Ginseng is of great medicinal value.
And in the event that you do fall ill, stock up on herbal remedies like ginseng and black elderberry.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你生病了，你可以使用人参和黑接骨木等中草药。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ginsenoside can prevent or delay the development of hypertrophy.
sentences.chinese: 结论人参皂苷在早期能预防或延缓心肌肥大的发生。

sentences.english: Objective To construct an expression system of HBsAg in ginseng cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立乙肝病毒表面抗原的人参细胞表达系统。

sentences.english: Ginseng is a perennial dicotyledonous herbs Nightshade classes.
sentences.chinese: 人参果属茄科类多年生双子叶草本植物。

sentences.english: The study on the pharmacological mechanism of ginsenoside had achieved great progress.
sentences.chinese: 尽管人参皂甙药理机制的研究已取得很大进展。

sentences.english: A ginseng supplement or sipping tea with ginseng can help improve energy.
sentences.chinese: 含人参的食物或者参茶都会让你活力无限。

sentences.english: Now only the genus Panax can be called ginseng on labeling or in advertising.
sentences.chinese: 现在只有属人参可以在标签或广告中称为人参。

sentences.english: Now only the genus Panax can be called ginseng on labeling or in advertising.
sentences.chinese: 现在只有属人参可以在标签或广告中称为人参。

sentences.english: Conclusion Pseudo-ginsenoside CQ showed fairly strong function of anti-fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 结论伪人参皂苷GQ显示出较强的抗疲劳作用。

sentences.english: Running for governor of New York the first time as an Independent.
sentences.chinese: 第一次作为无当派人参加纽约州州长的竞选。

sentences.english: This is the genuine ginseng from Northeast.

definition: young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
